name: Raided - A Platformer
description:
INSTRUCTIONS

-A and D or left and right arrow keys to move.

-Get to the right side of the screen to go to the next level.

-Get to the end to see what happens

-Try not to touch the color red and acid

CREDITS

Platformer engine by @--AwesomeCode--

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/452873473/

the rest (art, creativity, ideas) was by me :D

Music by xaf on Scratch

Thanks to @superdrag0n on scratch for this epic remix that I could post here! and of course my self lolll!
